lines: 1. Once our blessed Christ of beauty Was veiled off from human view; But through suffering, death, and sorrow He has rent the veil in two.
Refrain : O behold the Man of Sorrows! O behold Him in plain view! Lo! He is the mighty Conqueror Since He rent the veil in two; Lo! He is the mighty Conqueror Since He rent the veil in two.
2. Yes, He is with God, the Father, Interceding there for you; For He is the Well-beloved Since He rent the veil in two.
3. Holy angels bow before Him Men of earth give praises due; For He is the mighty Conqueror Since He rent the veil in two.
